flags.name: --max-capacity-tons
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.

flags.name: --min-capacity-tons
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.

flags.name: --threshold-tons
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.

permissions: Admins can create inventory capacities. Non-admin users can create inventory capacities for material sites whose material suppliers belong to a broker the user can see or whose material suppliers are directly visible to the user.
validation_notes: --material-site and --material-type are required. max_capacity_tons, min_capacity_tons, and threshold_tons must be numbers greater than or equal to 0 when provided. material_site_id must be unique within a given material_type_id.
